pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to Myrrix. Myrrix is a Complete, Real-Time, Scalable Clustering and Recommender System, Evolved from Apache Mahout // Recommendation engine based on 'Myrrix'. 'Myrrix' is a complete, real-time, scalable clustering and recommender system, evolved from 'Apache Mahout'. It uses Alternating Least Squares to build a recommendation engine.
